1.content:
You enter a building with the sign Anthos and Chims lit in yellow and orange LEDs you reach a receptionist who tells you the doctor will be with you shortly, and as she said within only two or three minutes a man in a lab coat walks out to greet you

"I'm doctor Yoll. Come my office is this way".

He leads you to his office, he sits behind his desk and you sit in the chair in front of it.

He brings out a clipboard and clicks a pen.

"So, what'll you have?"
1.title: Paging Doctor Yoll

11.content:
"Okay. What combination will you have?"

(Make your own combinations in the available slots, then I'll reply with the following chapter)
11.title: Chimera (Multiple Animals)

12.content: "A Jurassic Park fan eh. Never liked the second one. Anyway. What would you like?"
12.title: Dinosaur

121.content: "Playing safe, very wise. So which is your favorite?"
121.title: Herbivore

choices: Hybrid Dinosaur (I.E. Indominus Rex and Indoraptor)
122.content: "That's quite a risk. May need some extra paperwork. Oh well, we'll cross that bridge when we get to it. What'll it be chief?"
122.title: Carnivore

13.content: "Ah. You're definitely a person who has an eye for Fantasy. Very well, what shall it be?"
13.title: Mystical Creature

info.brief_description: You get to make your own monster through super advanced genetic editing.
info.description:
In the year 2157 genetic editing has become the next hottest fad in science. Forty years later it still is. Scientists can't get enough of playing God and say "fuck you" to nature by creating Chimeras. Beasts that are a combination of multiple animals, usually larger than humans, and sometimes antrohopormorphic.

You, feeling lonely and in need of a new friend, decide to go to your local gene-rator to have a chimera (or single species anthro) created for you. The only requirement is DNA from one of your family members.

RULES
I'll allow any fetish material excluding Disposal (pooping or peeing, but It's okay if it's implied.)
Scary or suspenseful situations are encouraged.
